name: Nature's Walk
description:
Made for a school project, Nature's Walk brings you on a short journey through nature, and shows the beauty of it all. It also compares the present day city and what the land once was.

The game is short, with calm and relaxing music. The game is just walking and appreciating the view.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Mouse - Camera Movement

R - Reset Character

Escape - Exit Game
